thread.title: Satya’s New Year Sale: Huge Discounts on LG and Samsung TVs, Combo Gifts, and Special Offers on Home Appliances
thread.title_full: Satya’s New Year Sale: Huge Discounts on LG and Samsung TVs, Combo Gifts, and Special Offers on Home Appliances

author: time news
title: Satya’s New Year Sale: Huge Discounts on LG and Samsung TVs, Combo Gifts, and Special Offers on Home Appliances
text:
2023-12-28 21:36:00
Shop more and save more at Satya’s New Year Sale
If you’ve been eyeing a new TV or home appliance, now is the time to make your purchase at Satya’s New Year Sale. With huge discounts and cashback offers, you can shop to your heart’s content and still save big.
One of the biggest draws of the sale is the discounts on LG OLED TVs. Not only are the TVs themselves on sale, but there’s also a special combo gift offer. Purchase an LG OLED TV and receive premium brand ear buds worth Rs 12,990 for only Rs 1,499. That’s a steal for a high-quality accessory.
But LG isn’t the only brand offering great deals. Samsung is also in on the action, with a special offer on their 75 inch Ultra HD TV. Purchase this TV and get Sony Ear Buds worth Rs 8,990 for only Rs 3,999. It’s a fantastic way to enhance your viewing experience with top-notch audio.
Home appliances are also a part of the sale, with special discounts and combo gifts available. Purchase a Front Load Washing Machine and get a 3 Liter Instant Water Heater as a combo gift. Or opt for a Godrej Top Load Washing Machine and receive a Mixi as a gift. It’s a great way to upgrade your home without breaking the bank.
In addition to these great offers, there are easy installment options available for those who prefer to spread out their payments. And don’t forget about the cashback offer, which can help you save even more on your purchase.
If you’re ready to take advantage of these amazing deals, head to Satya’s New Year Sale at one of their locations in RS Puram, 100 Feet Road, Oppanakkara Road, Goundampalayam, Singhanallur, or Sulur. You can also give them a call at 98403 68985 or 98401 56985 for more information.
Don’t miss out on the chance to shop more and save more at Satya’s New Year Sale. With these unbeatable offers, there’s never been a better time to upgrade your home entertainment and appliances.
#Easy #Installment #Big #Savings #Easy #Installment #Big #Savings
